attributes.action: all MPs expense claims to be verified with a receipt regardless of the amount
attributes.additional_details: Every MP's expenses claim needs to be available on line and  MUST be accompanied by a receipt, the same as is common practice within every other UK business.  This way taxpayers will be able to see very clearly exactly what items their MP is claiming for.

rejection.details: Publication of Members' expenses are a matter for the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority.
